sc-upload-listview.desc: The `<sc-upload-listview>` element is an element that can express file information in the form of a list of `<sc-upload>` elements, and provides custom fields, location change, and size change functions.

events.desc: When a file item is selected, the event is propagated.
events.name: item-select

properties.name: doubleClickDownload
properties.desc: This property determines whether or not to download when an attached file item is double-clicked.

properties.name: editable
properties.desc: This setting activates the file attachment and deletion function of attached files. If the value is `true`, the dropText phrase is displayed, and `false` the dropText phrase is not displayed.

properties.name: fileMap
properties.desc: Returns information about files in key and value format.

properties.name: files
properties.desc: This is a list of attached files managed by the `<sc-upload-listview>` element.

properties.name: getCustomizedStateImage
properties.desc: Returns a status class that matches the status value (provided so that it can be used by customizing the image externally)

properties.name: getStateImage
properties.desc: Returns a state class matching the state value

properties.name: headers
properties.desc: Returns all header elements in listview.

properties.name: interactDraggableElementRect
properties.desc: If it is outside the drag area, it is automatically moved inside the drag area according to the set top, left, bottom, and right values. For the left and right properties, 0 means the leftmost side of the element, and 1 means the rightmost side of the element. In the top and bottom properties, 0 means the top of the element and 1 means the bottom. Please refer to interactjs' draggable restrict.elementRect.

properties.name: isAvailable
listboxElement
properties.desc: Returns a `<sc-listbox>` element representing the list of files in the listview.

properties.name: listboxTemplateElement
properties.desc: Returns a `<template>` element representing the list of files in the listview.

properties.name: listviewContentElement
properties.desc: Returns the content element of listview.

properties.name: listviewDummyElement
properties.desc: Returns the dummy element of listview.

properties.name: listviewHeaderElement
properties.desc: Returns the header element of listview.

properties.name: listviewSortedHeaderElement
properties.desc: Returns the sorted header elements of the listview's header.

properties.name: processNullValue
properties.desc: Returns a status class that matches the status value (provided so that it can be used by customizing the image externally)

properties.name: reorderable
properties.desc: This is a function that allows you to change the order of columns by dragging and dropping. It is activated when the value is `true`.

properties.name: resizable
properties.desc: This is a function that allows you to change the size of the column. It is activated if the value is `true`.

properties.name: selectedFileCount
properties.desc: Returns the number of selected file lists in listview.

properties.name: selectedFiles
properties.desc: Returns the list of selected files in listview.

properties.name: selectionAllElement
properties.desc: Returns the select all checkbox element of the listview header.

properties.name: setAvailable
properties.desc: Check the view in use among the set view types

properties.name: setSelectItem
properties.desc: Enter a file and select an item.

properties.name: showFileNameTooltip
properties.desc: Tooltip?

properties.name: size2String
properties.desc: Returns the file size in human-recognizable characters.

properties.name: sort
properties.desc: Sorts the file list in listview.

properties.name: sortDataField
properties.desc: This is the field name that becomes the standard when sorting files.

properties.name: sortDirection
properties.desc: File sort direction (asc/desc).

properties.name: uploadTemplates
properties.desc: Returns the column information template of listview.

properties.name: uploadUtil
properties.desc: Returns SCUploadUtil.

properties.name: __bundleName
properties.desc: sc-i18n This is the bundleName name used when processing multiple languages.

properties.name: __i18nBundleName
properties.desc: sc-i18n property This is the bundleName name used when processing multiple languages.

properties.name: _boundByteToFormattedDisplaySize
properties.desc: This function returns the file size by combining 2 decimal places and unit characters.

properties.name: _computedAllSelectionDisabled
properties.desc: Returns whether the listview's select all checkbox is disabled.

properties.name: _computedDropInfo
properties.desc: Returns whether the dropText phrase of listview is used.

properties.name: _computedFlexWidth
properties.desc: The length of the listview variable size column is calculated and returned.

properties.name: _filesChanged
properties.desc: If the file list in listview changes and a sorted column exists, the file list is sorted.

properties.name: _findTemplateElement
properties.desc: Returns the template element of listview column information.

properties.name: _generateRowTemplate
properties.desc: Create a listview file list template.

properties.name: _interactDraggableTransform
properties.desc: When the header position or size of the listview changes, the file list is re-rendered.

properties.name: _interactPropertiesChanged
properties.desc: Enables or disables the sc-interact-behaviors function based on the reorderable and resizable property values ​​of the listview.

properties.name: _isResizer
properties.desc: Returns whether there is an indicator element for header size change.

properties.name: _listboxItemRender
properties.desc: Render the file list in listview.

properties.name: _listViewOffsetHeight
properties.desc: This is the height value of the sc-upload-listview element.

properties.name: _listViewOffsetWidth
properties.desc: This is the width value of the sc-upload-listview element.

properties.name: _onAllSelectionChange
properties.desc: Change the selection state of the file list with the listview's all selection state change event handler.

properties.name: _onDblClick
properties.desc: When you double-click the content area of ​​the listview, an `add` event is propagated so that the file dialog is activated.

properties.name: _onDownload
properties.desc: When you double-click the file list in listview, a `download` event is propagated.

properties.name: _onHeaderClick
properties.desc: The listview's header area click event handler sorts the file list depending on whether sorting is used.

properties.name: _onListboxItemSelect
properties.desc: When a file item in the listview is selected, an `item-select` event is propagated.

properties.name: _onListboxRender
properties.desc: The file list rendering of listview is complete. The size of the header and file list is determined by the event handler.

properties.name: _onListViewInteractDrag
properties.desc: When changing the header position of listview, the position of a copy of the header element is calculated and displayed on the screen.

properties.name: _onListViewInteractDragEnd
properties.desc: When changing the header position of the listview is completed, the listview is re-rendered.

properties.name: _onListViewInteractDragStart
properties.desc: Initializes the header position change or size change function of listview.

properties.name: _onListViewListBoxRender
properties.desc: Delays rendering of the file list in listview.

properties.name: _onListviewScroll
properties.desc: Synchronizes the scroll position of the header element with the scroll event handler of the listview's content area.

properties.name: _onSelectionClick
properties.desc: When you select the file list in listview, the state of the Select All checkbox changes.

properties.name: _prepare
properties.desc: Initialize listview.

properties.name: _prepareTemplatize
properties.desc: Initialize the listview file list template.

properties.name: _renderHeaders
properties.desc: Creates a listview header element.

properties.name: _selectionChanged
properties.desc: When selecting or deselecting a list of files in a listview, a `select` or `deselect` event is propagated.

properties.name: _sortPropertyChanged
properties.desc: When the sorting criteria field changes, the sort function is called.

properties.name: doContentElementResize
properties.desc: The size of the listview's content area is calculated and reflected.

properties.desc: This property determines whether or not to download when an attached file item is double-clicked.

If it is outside the drag area, it is automatically moved inside the drag area according to the set top, left, bottom, and right values. 
For the left and right properties, 0 means the leftmost side of the element, and 1 means the rightmost side of the element. 
In the top and bottom properties, 0 means the top of the element and 1 means the bottom.
Please refer to interactjs' draggable restrict.elementRect.
